title: From Against the Rules with Michael Lewis: Six Levels Down
description: We’re sharing a special preview of the new season of Against the Rules from Pushkin Industries. In this clip, bestselling author Michael Lewis explores the idea that, in any big company, the person who can actually solve a problem is often buried six levels deep in the organization. You can hear more episodes of Against the Rules at podcasts.pushkin.fm/atrmd.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
